name: Summon Masks
description:
Summon Masks is a competitive game, which we have 14 Masks in each side of a circle, take a side and push the enemy out of that circle.

Game Objective: To push 6 enemy masks out of the mark.

Rules:
Each player can move 1, 2 or 3 Masks at the same time on a line, at any direction, only one step.

When a player has more Masks then the enemy in a row (without blanc space between them), he can push the enemy Masks.
